workflow.name: Track Udemy course discounts with Airtop, Google Sheets and Telegram alerts
workflow.description:
## ‚úÖ What problem does this workflow solve?

Online course prices‚Äîespecially on platforms like Udemy‚Äîchange frequently and often include **time-limited discounts**. Manually checking prices, coupon availability, and offer expiration is tedious and unreliable.

This workflow automates **browser-based price tracking** using **Airtop**, detects **high-discount deals**, logs them in Google Sheets, and instantly notifies you on **Telegram**‚Äîall without scraping hacks or brittle scripts.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è What does this workflow do?

* Automates real browser interactions using **Airtop**
* Searches Udemy for specific course topics
* Extracts live course pricing and offer data
* Detects discounts of **50% or more**
* Logs deal details in Google Sheets
* Sends real-time Telegram alerts before offers expire

---

## üß† How It Works ‚Äì Step by Step

### 1. ‚è± Schedule Trigger

The workflow runs automatically at a fixed interval (hourly or daily).

---

### 2. üåê Create Browser Session (Airtop)

* Starts a new Airtop browser session
* Opens Udemy search results for a specific keyword (e.g., `n8n`)

---

### 3. üîç Scrape Course Data

Using Airtop‚Äôs extraction capabilities, the workflow collects:

* Course title
* Instructor name
* Current price
* Original price (if available)
* Rating
* Offer expiration time
* Course URL

---

### 4. üîÅ Loop Through Courses

Each course is processed individually to:

* Check if an offer exists
* Skip non-discounted courses

---

### 5. üßÆ Calculate Discount Percentage

* Extracts numeric price values
* Computes discount percentage
* Filters courses with **‚â• 50% discount**

---

### 6. üìä Log Deals in Google Sheets

For qualifying deals, the workflow appends:

* Course title
* Instructor
* Original & discounted price
* Discount percentage
* Rating
* Offer time left
* Course URL

This creates a **persistent deal history** for tracking and analysis.

---

### 7. üì£ Telegram Notification

When a high-discount deal is found, a formatted Telegram alert is sent including:

* Course name
* Instructor
* Discount amount
* Price comparison
* Rating
* Direct course link
* Offer expiration info

---

### 8. üßπ Cleanup

* Closes the Airtop browser window
* Terminates the session to conserve resources

---

## üß© Integrations Used

* **Airtop** ‚Äì No-code browser automation
* **n8n** ‚Äì Workflow orchestration
* **Google Sheets** ‚Äì Deal tracking & logging
* **Telegram Bot API** ‚Äì Instant deal alerts

---

## üë§ Who is this for?

This workflow is perfect for:

* üéì Learners hunting course deals
* üß† Knowledge seekers tracking Udemy discounts
* ü§ñ Automation enthusiasts exploring browser automation
* üìâ Price monitoring use cases beyond e-learning

parameters.prompt:
title, Current price, Original price, url, instructors name, rating, offerLeftTime(provided offerLeftTime is e.g,20 hours left at this price!)

Original price is not available to "" blank output provide

documentId.cachedResultName: Online Course Price Tracker with Coupon Detection

parameters.content:
## How it works
This workflow monitors Udemy courses for deep discounts (50%+) and alerts you via Telegram.

Every day, it launches a browser session using Airtop, scrapes course listings from Udemy search results, and extracts pricing data. Each course is checked for active offers‚Äîif the original price exists, the workflow calculates the discount percentage. Courses with 50%+ discounts are logged to Google Sheets and sent as formatted Telegram notifications with instructor, rating, and time-limited offer details.

## Setup steps
1. Connect your Airtop account (for browser automation)
2. Update the search URL in "Create a window" to match your course interests
3. Connect Google Sheets and select your tracking spreadsheet
4. Add your Telegram bot token and chat ID
5. Adjust the schedule trigger frequency (default: daily at midnight)


### Sample sheet:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1JQE5aW11UriY-jtybq9LTXqu-Un3khZuNp7SzSjXnVU/edit?gid=0#gid=0

## Browser Automation
Launches Airtop session, opens Udemy search page, and scrapes course data using AI extraction.

## Data Processing
Splits scraped courses into individual items and filters for those with active discount offers.

## Discount Detection
Calculates discount percentage and saves courses with 50%+ discounts to Google Sheets, then sends Telegram alerts.

## Cleanup
Closes browser window and terminates Airtop session after processing all courses.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
